result.execSummary:
The defendant Carmen JoAnn Cervantes was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Rock County Ordinance - Possession of Controlled Substance. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: 9:28 AM Defendant Carmen JoAnn Cervantes not in court.  Attorney Richard Russell McCue Jr in court for Carmen JoAnn Cervantes.  Attorney Gerald Anthony Urbik in court for State of Wisconsin.  Amended complaint to forfeiture filed.  No contest plea entered to county ordinance. Court finds defendant guilty.  Court orders $100 forfeiture and cost due in 60 days.
Letter to Courts from Attorney McCue
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 14, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Maintain absolute sobriety. No possession of controlled substances.

Activity: Initial appearance 
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

1:22 PM Defendant Carmen JoAnn Cervantes in court by video with attorney Richard Russell McCue by video.  Kyle Edward Johnson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant address and date of birth verified.  Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived.  Signature bond set of $1000 with conditions.  Maintain absolute sobriety. No possession of controlled substances. Defendant must sign bond on May 10, 2022 between 12 PM and 1 PM. Defendant pleads not guilty. Matter to be set.
Initial appearance on May 9, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
